changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS GAME_SESSIONS ( ID bigserial not null constraint GAME_SESSION_PK primary key );
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS GAME_EVENTS ( ID bigserial not null constraint GAME_EVENT_PK primary key, game_id bigint not null constraint game_event_id_fk references GAME_SESSIONS, created_at timestamp default now(), sender_id varchar(9), value int );
